channel.title: Thanksgiving on Family Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Thanksgiving on Family Recipes

item.title: Mushroom Gravy
item.description: Ingredients 3/4 cup of chopped button mushrooms 1 small onion 1/4 cup butter 2.5 cups vegetable broth 2 tbsp soy sauce 1/4 cup of flour 1 tbsp poultry seasoning Salt & pepper to taste Recipe Melt butter in skillet and add onion and mushrooms.Saute for two minutes over high heat. Reduce to medium heat and add broth and soy sauce. Add flour slowly and stir. Bring to a simmer and reduce heat.
